categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 1

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 1 is the first issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with an LED display for the buildable R2-D2 and contained the articles "Designing R2-D2, Part 1", "R2-series astromech droids, Part 1" and "LEDS: Light Emitting Diodes".
